column5: I feel your loss. I lost my father when I was 13 years of age, and my mother passed away in the year 2000. We can have hope of seeing our loved ones again in the provision of the great resurection mentioned in God's holy word the Bible.
Tom sorry to here of your loss out our thought are with you.
Sorry to hear the bad news tom,take care...
sorry for your loss
Tom:  Sorry to hear of your loss.  Regards, Snowball (Thunder Bay)
So sorry to hear of your loss Tom. Please accept our condolences. Jack & Jackie
Very sorry to hear this news Thom...our thoughts are with you....  Cliff and Carole
Sorry to hear of your loss Thomas, getting out on the ice fishing might eventually lift your spirits.
Sad news indeed Tom. Sorry for your loss, and you have my deepest condolences as well.
....I am saddened to hear this Tom, please accept my sincerest condolences.
Very sorry to hear the terrible news. Keep her in your heart and remember all the great times.
Sorry for your loss.  Dan
im so sorry to hear your sad loss!  my condelences to you and your family.
My deepest sympathies.  Mike
Very sorry for your loss.  Take care.
Sorry to hear about your loss. My condolences to you and your family
My condolences.
Thank you everyone for all the kind words am pm's. It is very much appreciated.  Tom
Sorry to hear that, condolences.
I am very sorry about the loss of your mother Tom. My deepest condolences go out to you.
Thats terrible news, my condolences.
So sorry to hear, Tom!  Deepest condolences from Jeff & I.
Im sorry to hear about your loss
Budday, we're here for you.  Sad news indeed.  Hope she went peacefully..  Take good care Tom.  HD
condolences to you and your family
I'm sorry Tom.
So sorry to hear about the loss of your Mom Tom.
Tom, I am so sorry to hear that. My deepest condolances to you and your family.
condolences to you and your family
Probably the saddest moment in any ones life.  Hope the memories offer you some strength.
Condolences to you and your family.
My condolences to you and your family on your loss.  Stan
Sorry to hear Tom, you know if you need anything....just call...  Maureen
I am sorry for your loss. Jim
Our deepest condolences Thomas.  When all is said and done... a nice back lake, an auger and a comfy sled seat will help you reflect on all the great years you had together.
My deepest sympathy to you and your loved ones....but know this ......with her passing i believe it isnt the end ....for as long as your heart beats ...she lives on forever through you and yours.
Tom.  Allow me to pass on my most sincere condolences as well.
So sorry to hear of your loss Tom. May her spirit will live on in your heart forever!
Tough thing to swallow Tom. So sorry to hear.
Sorry to hear it bud,take care. Joe
Our thoughts and prayers go out to you and your family.  Curt
Sorry for your loss...remember the good times...
Deepest condolences Tom
about an hour ago. She was 86 and in a Nursing home. Damn, I will miss her.
Sorry to hear...
God Bless you both.
My condolences really sorry bud, May she rest in peace.
Sorry to hear it Tom.
Sorry to hear tjsa    My condolences to you and your family
Sorry for you loss and my condolences to you and your family.
My condolences to you and your family
I'm sorry, Tom.  I understood that she had a long tough fight.  She must have been a helluva gal.  God Bless.  Doug
Sorry to hear his Tom. Thoughts and prayer are with you and your family .
My condolences to you and your family .  sorry for your loss
I'm so sorry to hear that Tom, my deepest condolences.
So sorry to hear that Tom. Sis and I express our sincere condolences.
Sorry to hear about the passing of your Mom....our condolences to you and your family...
So sorry to hear that news Tom, my sympathies to you and yours.
So sorry to hear that Tom, my condolences to you and yours.
Sorry to hear that Tom.  86 is a pretty good age to live to.  Our condolances to you and your family.  Joey & Tybo
Sorry to hear about that Thomas. Hold your mother in your heart. Things always work out.  You be well.....a lot of folks here pulling for you.
Our condolences to you and your family.  Regards, Sam
my condolences to you and your family   Hawg Hunter
Sorry to hear this My condolences to you and your family.
Sorry for your loss Tom, our deepest condolences.  Sinker
Sorry to hear about your loss, my condolences to you and your family.
Sad news Tom.... Deepest condolences from Carol and I go out to you and your family
Sad news Tom, especially this time of year.  May you be heartened by all the good memories. Prayers are with you.
